images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing the beaches and warm sunset colors, aligning perfectly with the campaign's adventurous and exotic tone.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to travel packages to Thailand during the autumn season, encouraging user engagement and action.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to travel packages to Thailand during the autumn season, encouraging user engagement and action.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to travel packages to Thailand during the autumn season, encouraging user engagement and action.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email to ensure brand recognition and consistency throughout the campaign.
AI-selected This background pattern will enhance the overall aesthetic of the email, providing a tropical and vibrant feel that complements the campaign's theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting tropical beaches, vibrant sunsets, and cultural festivals like Loy Kratong

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Bangkok and its attractions
assetRequirements.content_context: highlighting street food, local culture, and scenic views

assetRequirements.purpose: illustrate the autumn season in Thailand
assetRequirements.content_context: showing the transition from rainy season to comfortable weather

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Тайланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients

Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
